caption.center: MARGUERITE L. NOWELL v. AMES NOWELL

opinion.opinion_text: The application by the defendant for a stay of execution or for an extension of time is granted to the extent that the effective date of the order of May 10, 1967, is deferred until October 3, 1967.
opinion.attorneys:
John J. Sullivan, in support of the application.
Edgar W. Bassick III, in opposition.
